name: eslint-eo-plugin
author: Roman Shaposhnikov <roman_shaposhnikov_pub@mail.ru>
description: ESLint plugin for stick to the theory of Elegant Objects

scripts.test: npm run test:types && npm run test:rules
scripts.build: npm run build:clear && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm && npm run build:types && npm run build:copy
scripts.build:cjs: tsc -p tsconfig.cjs.json && bash createPackage.sh commonjs _cjs && npx tsc-alias -v --dir dist/_cjs -p tsconfig.cjs.json
scripts.build:esm: tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json && bash createPackage.sh module _esm && npx tsc-alias -v --dir dist/_esm -p tsconfig.esm.json
scripts.build:types: tsc -p tsconfig.types.json && npx tsc-alias -v --dir dist/_types -p tsconfig.types.json
scripts.build:copy: cp package.json dist/package.json && cp README.md dist/README.md
